metadata.synopsis: One-liner fallback and hasmet for elderly walker01 in the LOW Park
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to the elderly woman who is walking in the LOW Park while she is separated from her partner

0.speaker: Martina Kostaka
0.text: If you happen to see my husband, do trip him up for me. Every day we do this bloody walk, and every day he wanders off.

1.speaker: Martina Kostaka
1.text: Bloody Bertram... How does he walk so godsdamned fast...
